thread.title: Xolo Black smartphone launched in India priced at Rs 12,999 on Flipkart
thread.title_full: Xolo Black smartphone launched in India priced at Rs 12,999 on Flipkart | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Xolo Black smartphone launched in India priced at Rs 12,999 on Flipkart
text:
Xolo Black smartphone was launched today priced at Rs 12,999 on Flipkart and will be available from July 13.
According to the in.techradar.com, Xolo Black comes with a 5.5 inch Full HD 1080p display powered by Snapdragon 615 octa-core CPU and 2GB RAM. It offers 16GB ROM which further expandable up to 32GB via microSD slot. The smartphone comes with 4G LTE support
In addition, Xolo Black is using Hive Atlas. Black has dual-cameras at the back with one of them being a 13MP and other is 2MP quality and then there is the customary 5MP front snapper for selfies.
Also, Xolo Black comes with a 3200mAh battery.
 10, 2015 5:13 pm
